_json.title: Ceiling Mounted Shower Curtain Rod + DIY Shower Curtain Tutorial
_json.gridTitle: Ceiling Mounted Shower Curtain Rod + DIY Shower Curtain Tutorial
_json.description: Looking for unique shower curtain ideas? Check out this chic DIY ceiling mounted shower curtain rod and DIY shower curtain that looks more like drapes than a shower curtain. Learn how to sew this pleated shower curtain and create your own modern shower curtains. This picture shows how I attached the inexpensive shower curtain liner for easy removeal and laundering. #diyshowercurtain #showercurtain #sewingtutorials

creator.name: Dans le Lakehouse | Modern DIY, Coastal Decor & Vintage Finds
